item.title: Teamwork is Dreamwork!
item.description: Utilizing R Studio and Python! In this class we've seen that R and Python are two different systems that can be used in order to make data manipulation easy and convienient. However, like they say- two is better than one! Why just use Python or R, when you can use both. The Dream Team By using the reticulate function, R and Python are able to communicate with each other to work togther.
